dimension:
4 1/8 x 4 3/4 x 4 3/4 in. (10.5 x 12.1 x 12.1 cm)
4 3/4 in. length of handle
title: Cermonial incense burner
description:
Vessel, supported on two bulbous feet and the end of a long handle in the form of a gourd.  Body, ridged at lower belly, carries three pierced Ceremonial incense burner, Monte Alban III.
step-motifs above the two front legs.  Wide flaring lip.  Vessel surface covered with clay, but handle shows a burnished brown slip over a pale body.  Traces of a pained design in red show on the gourd foot and the rim.  Badly cracked at rim.
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
